description: Antonio is a page right out of the ?basic stud material? cook book: olive skin, deep brown eyes, jet black hair and a tight muscled body.  Fresh from the gym, Antonio showers and shaves while I filmed.Almost immediately, I realized there's nothing basic about him - extraordinary is more like it. His brooding stare is as sexy as his big bright smile is friendly and inviting.  As he speaks, he exudes an confident yet effortless charm that is downright intoxicating.That well sculpted chest, white round ass and those tree trunk legs are covered in swirls of dark hair that begs to be touched while that thick, uncut meat asks for even more. When he moves to dining room, he serves up a load of fresh cream sauce that covers that magnificent bod and a good portion of the tablecloth.  Bone Appetit!
title: Mediterranean Male, Scene #02
